long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tags are increasingly favored in file management systems, especially for web applications. Neverthless, though many applications leverage tags for rapid retrieval, they oftentimes fail to support in-situ tagging across web applications. Tagether introduces a novel way to use folder names as tags to manage new content from any web pages while maintaining your repository structure. Just select and save, it is that simple.
